mapper.select:

SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parentID", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds" FROM a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM a LEFT JOIN p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN t_sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN t_sys_role_info r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN t_sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN t_sys_user_info u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND r.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND u.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM a LEFT JOIN p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN t_sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN t_sys_role_info r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' and r.id=#{id} WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND r.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY a.sort
select menu.*, ur.user_id from menu left join t_sys_role_menu rm on menu.id = rm.menu_id left join t_sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE menu.id=#{parentID} AND menu.del_flag= 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, target, icon, sort, is_show, permission, create_time, modify_time, remarks, del_flag, grade, version, system_type) VALUES ( #{parentID}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, now(), now(), #{remarks}, 0, #{grade}, #{version}, #{systemType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SET parent_id = #{parentID}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission}, modify_time = now(), system_type = #{systemType}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
